function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Leakage from temporary water supply points or improperly drained stormwater","Impact":"Potential for waterborne diseases and mosquito breeding","Mitigation":"Proper drainage systems, regular inspection and maintenance of water supply points","Technologies":"Waterproof membranes, drainage systems, monitoring sensors","People":"Building occupants, construction workers, surrounding community","Owner":"Building management, construction company, local government"},{"Description":"Ease of mosquito access to buildings through design features","Impact":"Increased risk of malaria transmission","Mitigation":"Reducing size and number of building openings, implementing screening and netting systems","Technologies":"Screening and netting materials, automated mosquito control systems","People":"Building occupants, surrounding community","Owner":"Building designers, facility management, local government"},{"Description":"Poor indoor air quality (IAQ) due to modifications in building openings","Impact":"Increased risk of respiratory diseases and airborne pathogen transmission","Mitigation":"Proper ventilation systems, air quality monitoring, indoor pollutant control","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, air quality sensors, air purification technology","People":"Building occupants, surrounding community","Owner":"Building designers, facility management, local government"}]}
